detaileddescription.para: Desc: This function sets up the breakout board communication with I2C using Adafruits_PWMServoDriver.cpp and to set the frequency of the servos to 60Hz.

Desc: This function sets which servo to use and what pulse to set that servos pwm to.
n
which servo on the breakout board am I calling. Starting with 0.
pulse
what is the pulse length (in micro seconds) the pwm of the servo is set to.

Desc: This function sets which servo to use using whichservo and what position out of 180 degrees for each servo (with limits).
whichservo
which servo would you like to use on the board
position
what position do you want to set the servo selected at
